function walletrechargebutton() { let showwalletrechargeportal=(document.getElementById("walletrecharge"))as HTMLDivElement; showwalletrechargeportal.style.display="block" } function walletRechargeinside(amount:number) { CurrentUser.WalletBalance=CurrentUser.WalletBalance+amount; alert(CurrentUser.WalletBalance); } function walletRecharge() { let RechargeAmount=parseInt((document.getElementById("input_amount") as HTMLInputElement).value); walletRechargeinside(RechargeAmount); alert("Wallet recharge Succesfull....") let showwalletrechargeportal=(document.getElementById("walletrecharge"))as HTMLDivElement; showwalletrechargeportal.style.display="none"; let showhome=(document.getElementById("user_home"))as HTMLDivElement; showhome.style.display="block"; } function Show_Balance() { alert("balance table"); let balance=(document.getElementById("current_balance") as HTMLInputElement); balance.innerHTML=CurrentUser.WalletBalance.toString(); alert(balance); let showbalancedisplay=document.getElementById("balance_table") as HTMLInputElement; showbalancedisplay.style.display="block"; }
